restaurant

Class WaiterAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Agent
      • restaurant.WaiterAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WaiterInterface

    public class WaiterAgent
extends Agent
implements WaiterInterface
    Restaurant Waiter Agent. Sits customers at assigned tables and takes their orders. Takes the orders to the cook and then returns them when the food is done. Cleans up the tables after the customers leave. Interacts with customers, host, and cook

    • Nested Class Summary

      Private class to hold information for each customer.
